channel.title: Delete Following NPC?
channel.description: Okay, I have recently added a Hellcat to my server. When I spawn it, it follows me perfect. But when I logout the cat stays on the game. I want to add something to my logout method so when I logout it deletes my cat. How do I do this?

item.title: Delete Following NPC?
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

Okay, I have recently added a Hellcat to my server.
When I spawn it, it follows me perfect.
But when I logout the cat stays on the game.
I want to add something to my logout method so when I logout it deletes my cat.
How do I do this?

Read full topic
